features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

features.name: Relentless Endurance
features.description: Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, drop to 1 HP instead.

features.name: Savage Attacks
features.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one extra damage die.
